general_market.title: Indian IT sector shows strong Q3 results amid global uncertainties
general_market.summary: Major IT companies report robust earnings growth despite global economic headwinds. TCS and Infosys lead the sector with strong client acquisitions.

general_market.title: Oil prices stabilize as refining margins improve for Indian refiners
general_market.summary: Reliance Industries and other refiners benefit from improved crack spreads. Energy sector outlook remains cautiously optimistic for 2024.

general_market.title: Market volatility expected amid global central bank policies
general_market.summary: Analysts warn of increased market volatility as central banks navigate inflation concerns. Investors advised to focus on fundamentally strong companies.

RELIANCE.NS.title: Reliance Industries expands renewable energy portfolio with new solar projects
RELIANCE.NS.summary: RIL announces major investment in solar energy projects as part of its green energy transition strategy. Expected to boost long-term growth prospects.

RELIANCE.NS.title: Reliance Retail's digital push shows promising early results
RELIANCE.NS.summary: Strong growth in e-commerce and digital services segment. Retail arm continues to expand market share in India's growing consumer market.

TCS.NS.title: TCS wins multi-billion dollar digital transformation deal from European bank
TCS.NS.summary: Major contract win demonstrates TCS's strength in digital services and banking solutions. Deal expected to contribute significantly to revenue growth.

TCS.NS.title: TCS increases hiring plans for 2024 amid strong demand outlook
TCS.NS.summary: Company plans to hire 40,000+ freshers this year as demand for IT services remains robust. Focus on emerging technologies and cloud services.

INFY.NS.title: Infosys beats Q3 estimates, raises FY24 revenue guidance
INFY.NS.summary: Strong performance across all business segments. Management expresses confidence in maintaining growth momentum through focused execution.

INFY.NS.title: Infosys Cobalt platform gains traction with 450+ solutions
INFY.NS.summary: Cloud transformation platform shows strong client adoption. Platform strategy positioning company well for digital transformation market.

metadata.description: Mock news sentiment data with realistic Indian market news articles
